caption.title: Antiviral potency of boceprevir (28), calpain inhibitors II (61), XII (62), and GC-376 (64), in CPE and VYR assays.
caption.p: a– d Primary CPE assay results of boceprevir ( 28), calpain inhibitors II ( 61), XII ( 62), and GC-376 ( 64). e– h Secondary VYR assay results of boceprevir ( 28), calpain inhibitors II ( 61), XII ( 62), and GC-376 ( 64). Each dot represents the average of three repeats from one experiment, and each assay was repeated in three different experiments. The curve fittings were shown in Supplementary information, Fig. S2.
